dr.evolution.alignment
Class SitePatterns

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.alignment.SitePatterns
All Implemented Interfaces:
PatternList, SiteList, TaxonList, Identifiable, XHTMLable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Taxon>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AscertainedSitePatterns
public class SitePatterns
extends java.lang.Object
implements SiteList, XHTMLable

Stores a set of site patterns. This differs from the simple Patterns class because it stores the pattern index for each site. Thus it has a connection to a single alignment.

Version:
$Id: SitePatterns.java,v 1.47 2005/06/22 16:44:17 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond
See Also:
Serialized Form
